channel.title: I made a server how do i find
channel.description: i read the how to make a server guide thing i did all steps on making hamatchi server how do i know what my server is named? and what port its in? it just told me to make a network on hamatchi download a source(testscape cause im a begginer) and then it told me i was finnished please help me find what my server is named lol.

item.title: I made a server how do i find
item.dc:creator: @breaking_the_bridge breaking the bridge
item.description:
@breaking_the_bridge wrote:

Just use the hamachi IP it gives you when you pull up your Hamachi client

Read full topic
item.source: I made a server how do i find

item.title: I made a server how do i find
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

yeah , go into ur server file (the extracted one) then click runserver.bat (has a black icon) and mines says somethin like

Starting pimpscape server on 0.0.0.0.0.0.43594 ok the last numbers after the zeros is ur port (click file>new port) But , click here , you forgot that some servers such as karmascape only say

Server started sucsessfully so if thats the case id try both ports (43594 + 5555) and if it still dosent work id check on the server tutorial list for a tut that changes ur port good luck! XD [br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2007, 02:43:29 PM[/size][hr]Oh , which source did u download??? u can change the name of ur server by goin to your client.java and searching (to search press ctrl+f) the name of the source u downloaded , (e.g Tobiasscape) and change ALL results you get to whichever name you want (e.g meoww555scape) hope this helps ! XD

Read full topic
